jobDescription: Job Summary:As a talented and dedicated Critical Care Director, your career is very valuable to people and with your special Critical Care (CCU) skill set, you can make a difference. We are seeking Critical Care Directors for acute care hospitals nationwide. Responsibilities of the Director of Critical CareThe Director of Critical Care assures great service, growth, development, and personnel management to ensure consistency in the Critical Care DepartmentDevelops, implements, and evaluates the Critical Care program to ensure quality patient care consistent with the Hospital missionMaintains complete and accurate records of assessments, financials and budgets of the CCU DepartmentPromotes a collaborative, interdisciplinary approach towards patients, families and all members of the CCU teamHow Can We Help You?Many exciting new CCU Director positions throughout the United States.One on One consulting to find the perfect career opportunityNO cost to you!We specialize in helping you decide what, where and how you can make your dream job come true.Offer both Permanent and Per Diem contractsSign on BonusFree resume writing and career coachingDaily Newsletter letter of opportunitiesEducationGraduate from an accredited School of NursingCurrent and Valid RN licenseBachelor of Science Degree in Nursing (BSN) requiredMaster’s degree strongly preferredCertificationsBLS RequiredExperience5+ years current experience working in acute care hospital in the Critical Care department2-5 years of experience working in a Critical Care unit in a leadership roleAbility to administer all proper clinical care of patientAbility to maintain accurate medical record transcriptionsAbility to work in a team environmentProblem solving skill setWorks collaboratively with healthcare professionals for quality patient care
